original_body_lines: Assetline Lands (Private) Limited, the real estate trading arm of the David Pieris Group of Companies, expanded its operations with the opening of a new branch in Negombo. This branch, located centrally at No. 394, Colombo Road, Negombo, is ideally situated to serve the needs of clients in the region.

To commemorate the event, three delighted customers who acquired land plots from ‘The Marina’ a residential land development project located in Marawila received their documentation. This strategic move not only signifies the company’s growing footprint but also underscores its unwavering commitment to customer convenience.

Commenting at the event Kalum Katipearachchi, Managing Director, ALPL said, “Currently with our four ongoing projects – Air Terrace in Seeduwa, The Marina in Marawila, Green City in Divulapitiya, and Urban Park in Madurankuliya, Assetline Lands continues to demonstrate its commitment to excellence in property development.”

He emphasized that venturing into Negombo isn’t merely about expansion; it’s a commitment to providing customers with unmatched convenience and a promise of elevated service. Established nearly three years ago, Assetline Lands has rapidly become a key player in the real estate industry, specialising in land sales, property trading, and residential property development.
